name: CloneHubdbTable
description:
Clone an existing HubDB table as a draft.

Use this tool to create a draft clone of an existing HubDB table. The new table's name and label can be specified.

parameters.name: source_table_id_or_name
parameters.description: The ID or name of the HubDB table to clone.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the table to clone.

parameters.name: is_hubspot_defined
parameters.description: Indicate if the table is defined by HubSpot. This is a boolean value where true means the table is HubSpot-defined.

parameters.name: copy_rows
parameters.description: Boolean indicating whether to copy the rows during the cloning process.

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to copy the rows during clone

parameters.name: new_table_name
parameters.description: The desired new name for the cloned HubDB table draft.

value_schema.description: The new name for the cloned table

parameters.name: new_table_label
parameters.description: The label for the new cloned table. Specify a descriptive label for identification.

value_schema.description: The new label for the cloned table

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: tableIdOrName
parameters.description: The ID or name of the table to clone.

value_schema.description: The ID or name of the table to clone.

parameters.name: newName
parameters.description: The new name for the cloned table

value_schema.description: The new name for the cloned table

parameters.name: newLabel
parameters.description: The new label for the cloned table

value_schema.description: The new label for the cloned table

parameters.name: copyRows
parameters.description: Specifies whether to copy the rows during clone

value_schema.description: Specifies whether to copy the rows during clone

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
